arts.ttl: Union Berlin and RB Leipzig share the spoils in Köpenick
arts.sum: Union Berlin and RB Leipzig both added a point apiece to their tally after playing out a tense 0-0 draw at Stadion an der Alten Försterei on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Torino prepare Ilic sale to Spartak Moscow, RB Leipzig replacement ready
arts.sum: Torino are on the verge of selling Ivan Ilic to Spartak Moscow for €22m and...

arts.ttl: Union Berlin reach agreement to sign Marin Ljubicic; Maximilian Philipp next?
arts.sum: Matters continue to proceed fast and furiously with regard to incoming transfers at 1. FC Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin linked with strikers Willem Geubbels and Marin Ljubicic
arts.sum: here's plenty of fresh news to report on regarding 1. FC Union Berlin as the transfer deadline draws to a close.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Sesko: Arsenal get ‘very big chance of transfer’ message from Fabrizio Romano
arts.sum: Arsenal have been given a positive message over RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko as manage Mikel Arteta continues to see a solution for the No.9 role before the transfer window shuts. Benjamin Sesko: Arsenal get ‘very big chance of transfer’ message from Fabrizio Romano

arts.ttl: Report: The 'extra' fee Arsenal will have to pay if they want to sign Benjamin Sesko before deadline day
€80m Xavi Simons to trigger club IMPLOSION as 'transfer not ruled out'
arts.sum: €80m Xavi Simons to trigger club IMPLOSION as 'transfer not ruled out' RB Leipzig are braced for summer interest in Xavi Simons despite sealing a blockbuster €80 million deal for him on Thursday, according to German media.

arts.ttl: Steffen Baumgart reflects on forthcoming East German Derby between Union Berlin and RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Looking ahead to this weekend's clash with a former East German footballing colleague, 1. FC Union Berlin trainer Steffen Baumgart commented on his feelings on the Bundesliga's "East German derby". Baumgart faces his fellow "Ossie" Marco Rose in a battle with RB Leipzig on Saturday night under the lights.

arts.ttl: Official: RB Leipzig loan Eljif Elmas out to Torino with €18m purchase option
arts.sum: Eljif Elmas' loan out to Serie A side Turin FC was confirmed yesterday.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs RB Leipzig preview: Inconsistent Leipzig look to bounce back after European defeat
arts.sum: RB Leipzig's push for Champions League qualification continues on Saturday as they head to Stadion An der Alten Försterei to face Union Berlin in Bundesliga action.
